(Received 23rd, 10.30 a.m.)6703. 16th May. Part 1. Later report from Parachinar evening of 14th states (corrupt group) no Afghans seen our side of Peiwar Kotal. Wana states that movement of troops from Urghun towards border of south Waziristan reported. Air reconnaissances 15th May report no large bodies troops between Hazarnao and Jalalabad. Afghans still busy with propaganda and agents amongst frontier tribes and militia. Two officers in aeroplane forced to descend in Bazar reported alive, their release anticipated. General tribal and internal (corrupt group).Part 2. In Chitral area a party of Afghans numbering some 300 who had occupied positions south of Mirkandi on Chitral river were attacked by (corrupt group) of Chitral Scouts and Mehtas bodyguard and driven back with some loss. We had no casualties. Elsewhere no operations have been reported.
